Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the interior is covered with a light-brown deposit with small metallic inclusions, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and very faint traces of at least four lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393324) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393324)
